alert.note: Alert for Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 20 at 1:36PM MDT until August 21 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 283 and 289. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Hot Temperatures...and Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * WIND: Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 16 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the upper 80s to middle 90s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
